item.title: Making NPC drop by %
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

I puted this in Npchandler:

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 127) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomAxe(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

and this in item:

public static int Axe[] = {1367,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995}; public static int randomAxe() { return Axe[(int)(Math.random()*Axe.length)]; }

and he does not drop anything!

Read full topic
